item.title: Almost Sorted Array(O(NlogN)LIS)
item.author: coldheart
item.description: Almost Sorted Array（nlogn的LIS） We are all familiar with sorting algorithms: quick sort, merge sort, heap sort, insertion sort, selection sort, bubble sort, etc. But sometimes it is an overkill to use these algorithms for an almost sorted array. We say an array is sorted if its elements are in non-decreasing order or non-increasing order. We

item.author: coldheart
